articles.author: Nick Robertson
articles.title: Counterproposal pauses negotiations in Hollywood writers strike - The Hill
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America (WGA) and the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers (AMPTP) came to the negotiation table for the first time Friday since the union went on strike in early May.  However, talks were paused after AMPTP offered a count…
